# Overview
This page contains a basic presentation showing how to use the DSAIRM package.



# Videos


This 2021 video illustrates the level 1 approach to DSAIRM, i.e. using the package through the graphical interface. The focus is on the _Basic Bacteria_ app. Along the way, various modeling topics are covered.
